label: backspace
description: Goes to the previous page in your browsing history for the tab.

label: <Meta>+[
description: Goes to the previous page in your browsing history for the tab

label: <Meta>+]
description: Goes to the next page in your browsing history for the tab.

label: <Meta>+<Ctrl>+F
description: Opens or Exits current page in full-screen mode. (TAO will enforce full screen.)

label: <Meta>+1
description: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

label: <Meta>+2
description: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

label: <Meta>+3
description: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

label: <Meta>+4
description: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

label: <Meta>+5
description: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

label: <Meta>+6
description: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

label: <Meta>+7
description: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

label: <Meta>+8
description: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip.

label: <Meta>+D
description: Saves your current webpage as a bookmark.

label: <Meta>+G
description: Finds the next match for your input in the find bar.

label: <Meta>+L
description: Highlights the URL. (Appears not to work in Full Screen Mode)

label: <Meta>+O
description: Opens a file from your computer in Google Chrome.

label: <Meta>+<Alt>+U
description: Opens the source of your current page.

label: <Meta>+W
description: Closes the current tab or pop-up.

label: <Meta>+<Shift>+B
description: Toggles the bookmarks bar on and off.  (Appears not to work in Full Screen Mode)

label: <Meta>+<Alt>+C
description: Open / switch from inspect element mode and browser window

label: <Meta>+<Shift>+D
description: Saves all open pages as bookmarks in a new folder.

label: <Meta>+<Shift>+G
description: Finds the previous match for your input in the find bar.

label: <Meta>+<Alt>+J
description: Open Developer Tools and bring focus to the console

label: <Meta>+<Shift>+N
description: Opens a new window in incognito mode.

label: <Meta>+<Shift>+T
description: Reopens the last tab you've closed.

label: <Meta>+<Shift>+H
description: Opens your home page in your current tab.

label: <Meta>+<Shift>+Delete
description: Opens the Clear Browsing Data dialog.

label: <Meta>+LeftMouseClick (Link)
description: Opens the link in a new tab in the background.

label: <Meta>+<Shift>+LeftMouseClick (Link)
description: Opens the link in a new tab in the background.

label: <Shift>+LeftMouseClick (Link)
description: Opens the link in a new window.

label: <Alt>+LeftMouseClick (Link)
description: Downloads the target of the link.

label: <Shift>+F6
description: Switches focus to the next keyboard-accessible pane. (Doesn't seem to work in fullscreen mode.)

label: <Alt>+space
description: Open the shortcut menu for the active window

label: esc
description: Stops the loading of the current page.

label: backspace
